channel.title: Demolitionx 711
channel.description:
Hey guys so my bros account Demolitionx711 got hacked so I will post another development here, the other can be locked.
http://screencast.com/t/pgAriKlw - Sexy And I know It Video http://screencast.com/t/Tq73xJOUFWyc - Call Me Maybe Video
[size=15pt]Update Log[/size] [code] 6/9/12- Added Mystery Boxes With Many Possibilities http://screencast.com/t/b6i2h0323N 6/10/12- Added Flawless Dicing http://screencast.com/t/5L29VhvM 6/11/12- Fixed Armadyl Staff- Fixed Polypore- Fixed TokHaar-Kal Cape- Fixed Economy 6/13/12- New shops 6/17/12- Added Tokens 6/18/12- Added Summoning - Added Full Trade - DFS Is Fixed - Fixed Up Castle Wars 6/19/12- Fixed Auras 100% - Fixed Duel To 100% 6/25/12 - Completely Switched Direction To Pk Server - Added Cool Donor Shop And Pk Shop. - Added 3 Pk Areas. - Added New Money Making System. [/code]
[size=12pt]Features From Before My Involvement:[/size] [code] 1>Farming,Mining,Woodcutting,Crafting,Herblore and Rares shop 2>Taken out Starter tutorial so you don't get 99's 3>Added a 500k cash starter 4>Made R.S Webclient look 5>item command only for players whit the privilege not for admins/mods or normal players [/code]
[size=12pt]Features From After My Involvement:[/size] [code] - Added Flawless Dicing http://screencast.com/t/5L29VhvM - Fixed Armadyl Staff - Fixed TokHaar-Kal Cape - Fixed Economy - New shops - Added Tokens WIth System - Added Summoning - Added Full Trade - Added Donor Zone - DFS Is Fixed - Fixed Up Castle Wars - Fixed Auras 100% - Fixed Duel To 100%[/code] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Zamorak.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Torms.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Teles.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Saradomin.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Safe_Pk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Nex.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Multi_Pvp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Home.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Duel_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Duel_1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Dominion_Tower.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Corp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Barrows.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Castle_001.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Bandos.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Armadyl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Castle.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/C_wars_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/Agility.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/C_wars_1.png[/img][IMG]http://i1137.photobucket.com/albums/n510/Devenb123/1v1.png[/img]

item.title: Demolitionx 711
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

Hey guys so my bros account Demolitionx711 got hacked so I will post another development here, the other can be locked.

http://screencast.com/t/pgAriKlw - Sexy And I know It Video
http://screencast.com/t/Tq73xJOUFWyc - Call Me Maybe Video

[size=15pt]Update Log[/size]

6/9/12- Added Mystery Boxes With Many Possibilities http://screencast.com/t/b6i2h0323N 6/10/12- Added Flawless Dicing http://screencast.com/t/5L29VhvM 6/11/12- Fixed Armadyl Staff- Fixed Polypore- Fixed TokHaar-Kal Cape- Fixed Economy 6/13/12- New shops 6/17/12- Added Tokens 6/18/12- Added Summoning - Added Full Trade - DFS Is Fixed - Fixed Up Castle Wars 6/19/12- Fixed Auras 100% - Fixed Duel To 100% 6/25/12 - Completely Switched Direction To Pk Server - Added Cool Donor Shop And Pk Shop. - Added 3 Pk Areas. - Added New Money Making System.

[size=12pt]Features From Before My Involvement:[/size]

1>Farming,Mining,Woodcutting,Crafting,Herblore and Rares shop
2>Taken out Starter tutorial so you don't get 99's
3>Added a 500k cash starter
4>Made R.S Webclient look
5>item command only for players whit the privilege not for admins/mods or normal players

[size=12pt]Features From After My Involvement:[/size]

[code]

  • Added Flawless Dicing http://screencast.com/t/5L29VhvM
  • Fixed Armadyl Staff
  • Fixed TokHaar-Kal Cape
  • Fixed Economy
  • New shops
  • Added Tokens WIth System
  • Added Summoning
  • Added Full Trade
  • Added Donor Zone
  • DFS Is Fixed
  • Fixed Up Castle Wars
  • Fixed Auras 100%
  • Fixed Duel To 100%[/code]
